name: Hentai Most Wanted
description:
Because of naked in public place, the Anime girl is now wanted by the police. The police has appeared everywhere to find her. Kill or be killed, The Anime girl now had no choice but to take up her sword and kill all the police who were hunting her. Play the Anime girl, help her escape from the police hunt. You can run away, hide, or kill all the police bastards. Please help her to escape.



FEATURES:


  • Play as an Anime girl with 100% nude.
  • High quality graphics along with attractive gameplay.
  • High quality music will help you relieve all stress.
  • Along with sneaky gameplay, you can kill enemies without being detected or detected and being shot and killed by enemies.
